Generate a tidied risk table

Source: R/vr_est_km_risk_table.R
vr_est_km_risk_table.Rd

TODO: Describe purpose of function and inputs / outputs

vr_est_km_risk_table(data, equation, min_at_risk = 3)

Arguments

data

input data set
equation

Survival function to be estimated in the format of Survfit.
min_at_risk

default = 3

Value

tibble that contains the tidied risk table

Examples

# Create interim data models
library(survival)
library(ggplot2)
#> Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 3.6.3
library(dplyr)
data("veteran")
data <-  veteran %>%
    mutate(trt = as.factor(case_when(
       trt == 1 ~ "standard therapy",
       trt == 2 ~ "test chemotherapy"
   )))

equation <- "survival::Surv(time, status) ~ trt"
vr_est_km_risk_table(data, equation)
#>    time                strata variable value                 strata_variable
#> 1     0  trt=standard therapy   n.risk    69    trt=standard therapy, n.risk
#> 2   100  trt=standard therapy   n.risk    34    trt=standard therapy, n.risk
#> 3   200  trt=standard therapy   n.risk    12    trt=standard therapy, n.risk
#> 4   300  trt=standard therapy   n.risk     5    trt=standard therapy, n.risk
#> 5   400  trt=standard therapy   n.risk     2    trt=standard therapy, n.risk
#> 6     0 trt=test chemotherapy   n.risk    68   trt=test chemotherapy, n.risk
#> 7   100 trt=test chemotherapy   n.risk    21   trt=test chemotherapy, n.risk
#> 8   200 trt=test chemotherapy   n.risk    13   trt=test chemotherapy, n.risk
#> 9   300 trt=test chemotherapy   n.risk     8   trt=test chemotherapy, n.risk
#> 10  400 trt=test chemotherapy   n.risk     4   trt=test chemotherapy, n.risk
#> 11    0  trt=standard therapy  n.event     0   trt=standard therapy, n.event
#> 12  100  trt=standard therapy  n.event    34   trt=standard therapy, n.event
#> 13  200  trt=standard therapy  n.event    19   trt=standard therapy, n.event
#> 14  300  trt=standard therapy  n.event     6   trt=standard therapy, n.event
#> 15  400  trt=standard therapy  n.event     3   trt=standard therapy, n.event
#> 16    0 trt=test chemotherapy  n.event     0  trt=test chemotherapy, n.event
#> 17  100 trt=test chemotherapy  n.event    45  trt=test chemotherapy, n.event
#> 18  200 trt=test chemotherapy  n.event     7  trt=test chemotherapy, n.event
#> 19  300 trt=test chemotherapy  n.event     4  trt=test chemotherapy, n.event
#> 20  400 trt=test chemotherapy  n.event     4  trt=test chemotherapy, n.event
#> 21    0  trt=standard therapy n.censor     0  trt=standard therapy, n.censor
#> 22  100  trt=standard therapy n.censor     1  trt=standard therapy, n.censor
#> 23  200  trt=standard therapy n.censor     3  trt=standard therapy, n.censor
#> 24  300  trt=standard therapy n.censor     1  trt=standard therapy, n.censor
#> 25  400  trt=standard therapy n.censor     0  trt=standard therapy, n.censor
#> 26    0 trt=test chemotherapy n.censor     0 trt=test chemotherapy, n.censor

#> 28  200 trt=test chemotherapy n.censor     1 trt=test chemotherapy, n.censor
